subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: For a few hours, Brian Cashman, the general manager of the Yankees, and Theo Epstein, Cashman’s counterpart with the Red Sox, were cordial rivals during a lecture at William Paterson University.
snippet: For a few hours, Brian Cashman, the general manager of the Yankees, and Theo Epstein, Cashman’s counterpart with the Red Sox, were cordial rivals during a lecture at William Paterson University.
